text: Phillip Gibbons, formerly of Intel Labs Pittsburgh, is a professor in the Computer Science Department and the Electrical & Computer Engineering Department at Carnegie Mellon University. Gibbons was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to parallel computing and databases. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Phillip Gibbons
